designs.name: Luxury Classic Fine Dining
designs.description: Elegant and timeless restaurant design with classic luxury appeal
designs.flooring: Polished marble or premium wooden flooring
designs.walls: Textured walls with moldings and fabric panels
designs.lighting: Warm ambient lighting with table-focused lights
designs.furniture: Upholstered dining chairs, solid wood tables
designs.prompt_keywords: luxury fine dining restaurant, classic elegant restaurant interior

designs.lighting: Soft diffused lighting with spotlighted tables
designs.prompt_keywords: modern fine dining restaurant, gourmet restaurant interior
